newsitem.title: FINLAND: FINNISH CONSUMER CONFIDENCE TO RECORD IN AUG -SF.
newsitem.headline: FINNISH CONSUMER CONFIDENCE TO RECORD IN AUG -SF.

text.p: Consumer confidence rose to 12.9 points in August from 10.9 in July, Statistics Finland said in a statement on Wednesday.
SF said this was a record.

Consumer confidence is measured as the average of estimates on five variables: One's own finances in the past year and coming year, the Finnish economy in the past and the coming year, and how advantageous it is to buy durable goods.
In June, consumer confidence was 9.8 points.
